title: still of the night
content:
what is the font most similar to this?  
thanx in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318094133im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Whitesnake_6129.jpg)

 [‹ Special Serif Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318094133/http:/typophile.com/node/43171 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Shostakovich: Piano Concerto No. 1" hybrid sans - Serifedsans {Rainer} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318094133/http:/typophile.com/node/43132 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rockberto

comments.content:
The word “LIVE” seems to be something else, like [Goudy Catalogue](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318094133/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Goudy+Catalogue&x=13&y=12&sample_text=LIVE), squooshed. The ends of the bottoms of the L and E are curved.

- Mike Yanega
